summary: WIPERS FAILED AS IN THE 2013 EQUINOX'S RECALL.  I WAS TRAVELING IN TRAFFIC ON US 85 SOUTH IN HEAVY RAINFALL.    ONLY BY SLOWING DOWN AND CAREFULLY MOVING TO THE RIGHT HAND LANE WHERE I COULD SEE THE WHITE LINE, WAS I ABLE TO KEEP CONTROL AND NOT BE IN AN ACCIDENT.  HAD I NOT BEEN AN EXPERIENCED DRIVER, IT COULD HAVE BEEN A MULTI CAR INCIDENT.
